Title: Responsive Pretty Good Base Theme Orchard Theme
Description: Responsive PGBT is a responsive Orchard theme that aims to provide a set of common markup and styling so other themes can easily inherit from it.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Responsive PGBT is a responsive Orchard theme that aims to provide a set of common markup and styling so other themes can easily inherit from it.

This repository has moved to GitHub. Please visit the new repository at https://github.com/Lombiq/Responsive-Pretty-Good-Base-Theme.

The CodePlex page is not maintained anymore, but still here for historical reference.

The theme extends Pretty Good Base Theme with responsive properties taken from The Theme Machine Responsive theme so credit goes to the Planet Telex team!
